Text:
Whoa, am I the first one to attempt to download this game? I just now saw the trailer and thought to check out, for curiosity's sake, if it's actually cracked, but I never thought it would be uploaded this fast!
I'll put it in my download queue, and when it downloads, I'll seed for as long as i can.
game crashes when run with an Access Violation
Game.exe will not run. Crashes to desktop after a 1 second long black screen. XP.
Warbuxx is right I get the same problem on win 7 64bit
right click , properties ,compatibilty, then disable visual themes & desktop composition, worked for me in win 7
This game crashes in a x64 OS. Patches and even the graphic check downloaded from their site crashes the same way.

If you have a crash saying "Access Violation "....install OpenAL. Run (as admin on win7
) oalinst.exe in game install folder. But it still crashing when loading screen appears after I choose new game in menu.
game.exe is infected with a virus!!

@magnu1969: This is a FALSE POSITIVE. The game installs and runs just fine, even on x64, and is completely virus-free.

For anyone having trouble, just make sure to install OpenAL when prompted. I refused the first time since I wasn't told what it was for, and the game crashed about 1 second after launching. After redoing the installation and accepting the OpenAL installer, the game runs just fine at 95FPS without any compatibility options.

I confirm, this torrent holds a virus. Kapersky deals well with keygen and cracks unlike other antivirus programs screaming for all cracks. I think the game is repacked and therefore it is not trusted.
